meta.title: Bug Loop | Online HTML Editor & Dev Blog
meta.description: Web developer blog | Web development tutorials & online code editor, plus transdisciplinary insightsâ€”all in one place!

profile.profile-bio1: A late-in-life student currently majoring in Computer Science and Hacking & Security at Hanyang Cyber University.
profile.profile-bio2: After earning a Bachelor's in Composition from Hanyang University, he studied acoustics for two years in the Basic Engineering program at Le Mans University in France.
profile.profile-bio3: As a severely visually impaired person, he studied Physics and Sound Design in the undergraduate and graduate programs at Le Mans University and Le Mans Beaux-Arts respectively, but dropped out of both due to difficulties adjusting to the school environment. He now works on the digital marketing team for a beauty company.

panel.title: Study Panel
panel.body: When you click a menu item, its tutorial will appear in this panel, and below you can try it yourself in the HTML editor. Drag the resizer handle to adjust the height; push it up to tuck the drawer under the header, then pull it down to bring it back.
